p.s: The novel Gun Love, by Jennifer Clement, published in 2019, is about 14-year old Pearl, who lived in a car with her mother for her whole life.
After her mother got shot she is brought to a foster home by CPSChild Protective Service.
In her new foster home she meets two other foster children, Leo and Helen.
Helen has no idea where she came from.
She was in many different foster homes, even though she is only 8 years old.
She talks a lot, so she tells Pearl about her different homes, different ethnics, brothers, sisters, twins, places she was born in and different religions her families practiced.
Every foster home gave her a phone and charger to keep in touch with them.
She has at least 17 phones and no idea which phone belongs to which foster home.
Leo and Pearl offer to help her find out who the phones belong to.
Altogether Pearl meets this little girl, who is completely the opposite of her.
Helen does not know the truth about her past and belivesbelieves everything the foster homes tell her.
She probably does not even understand that she is a foster childrenchild or she does not understand the true meaning of being a foster childrenchild.
